description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Peacebringers and Warshades and may be slotted into any of their damage powers.

UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Peacebringers and Warshades and may be slotted into any of their damage powers.

description.short: Enhances Accuracy, Damage and Increases Attack Rate
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}% and damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}% .  This enhancement can only be slotted by Peacebringers and Warshades and may be slotted into any of their damage powers.

description.short: Enhances Damage, Reduces Endurance Cost, and Increases Attack Rate
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Peacebringers and Warshades and may be slotted into any of their damage powers.

description.short: Enhances Accuracy and Damage, Increases Attack Rate, and Reduces Endurance Cost
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  Enhances the accuracy of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%, damage by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}%, reduces endurance cost by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}% and reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Peacebringers and Warshades and may be slotted into any of their damage powers.

description.short: Increases Attack Rate, Kheldian Form Bonus
description.long: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.  This enhancement boosts the effectiveness of the Kheldian's various forms.  While in human form they will benefit from enhanced damage resistance, while in Nova form they will deal greater damage and while in Dwarf form their maximum health will be increased.  Additionally, this enhancement reduces recharge time by {Boost.Attrib.Recharge.Scale}%.  This enhancement can only be slotted by Peacebringers and Warshades and may be slotted into any of their damage powers.
